from sklearn.neighbors import KNeighborsClassifier
score=[]
for each in range(1,10):
    
    knn2=KNeighborsClassifier(n_neighbors = each)
    knn2.fit(xTrain,yTrain)
    
    score.append(knn2.score(xTest,yTest))
    
plt.plot(range(1,10),score)
plt.show()
